summary.span: 表示 对象的集合，并用于包含 控件和 控件的项。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 访问的属性控制或的属性控件所检索对象。Accessing the property of a control or the property of a control retrieves a object. 可以添加或从在运行时集合中移除项。You can add or remove items from the collection at run time. 一个对象继承接口。A object inherits from the interface. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何操作中的项对象，通过类。The following code example shows how you manipulate items in the object through the class. 该代码使用中的选定的项的索引属性。The code uses the selected item's index into the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不是处于只读模式可用接口。This method is not available in the read-only interface. 可以使用应用此方法的所有类的方法。You can use the method for all the classes where this method applies. 例如，方法集合中清除所有的样式在集合; 或者对于，它会清除集合中的所有选项。For example, the method for a collection clears all the styles in the collection; or for the , it clears all the choices in the collection. 将字段添加到该控件的对象列表更改数据绑定行为的字段，并要求你再次将数据绑定到控件。Adding a field to the fields of an object list changes the data-binding behavior of the control, and requires you to bind data to the control again.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法后，属性将返回`true`。After this method has been called, the property will return `true`. 此外，的属性中的对象将设置为`true`。Also, the property of the objects in the will be set to `true`.
